Title: ExtAspNet
Description: ExtJS based professional ASP.NET 2.0 Controls. ExtAspNet has been renamed to FineUI.
HomeWiki:
ExtAspNet has been renamed to FineUI. Check it out!

About ExtAspNet
ExtJS based ASP.NET 2.0 Controls with native AJAX Support and rich UI effects.

ExtAspNet Mission
Create No JavaScript, No CSS, No UpdatePanel, No ViewState and No WebServices web application.

Support Browsers
IE 7.0, Firefox 3.6, Chrome 3.0, Opera 10.5, Safari 3.0+

License
Apache License 2.0 (Apache)

Demo&Download (Brand New English Version)
http://demo.extasp.net/en/

You can download ExtAspNet from CodePlex or install using NuGet:



Donate
ExtAspNet is a free open source project that has been developed more than 4 years with more than 90 releases. If you are using ExtAspNet commercially and finding it useful. Please donate to help support the future development.

 

Note: ExtAspNet include extjs inside, if you use ExtAspNet in a commercial project, you should purse a license from extjs.

 

 

=============================================

ExtAspNet 现已改名为 FineUI。 来看看！


关于ExtAspNet
基于 ExtJS 的专业 ASP.NET 2.0 控件库，拥有原生的 AJAX 支持和华丽的UI效果。

ExtAspNet的使命
创建没有 JavaScript，没有 CSS，没有 UpdatePanel，没有 ViewState，没有 WebServices 的网站应用程序。

支持的浏览器
IE 7.0+、Firefox 3.6+、Chrome 3.0+、Opera 10.5+、Safari 3.0+

授权协议
Apache License 2.0 (Apache)

文档：http://doc.extasp.net/
下载：http://extaspnet.codeplex.com/

捐赠
ExtAspNet作为一款开源软件已经持续开发了 4 年有余并发布了 90 多个版本，并还将继续下去。如果你在商业软件中使用了ExtAspNet，请捐赠作者以帮助ExtAspNet的持续开发。

支付宝：https://me.alipay.com/leizhang

 

注：ExtAspNet内置了extjs，如果在商业项目中使用了ExtAspNet的话，可能需要获得extjs的授权。
